title: How many albums has BTS sold? - Quora

response.answer_text: Map of the Soul: Persona (Korean EP) Release Date: Apr 12, 2018 3.524 Million Units in Korea339,000 in Japan466,000 in China500,000 in the US60,000 in the UK10,000 in PolandBTS Love Yourself: Answer (Korean Studio Album) Release Date: Aug 24, 2018 2.448 Million Units in Korea328,000 Units in China240,000 Units in Japan500,000 Units in the US60,000 in the UKLove Yourself: Tear (EP) Release Date: May 18, 2018 1.972 Million Units in Korea308,000 Units in China190,000 Units in Japan213,000 Units in the USFace Yourself (Japanese Studio Album) Release Date: Apr 4, 2018 500,000 Units in JapanLove Yourself: Her (EP) Release Date: Sep 18, 2017 2.054 Million Units in Korea281,000 Units in ChinaOver 100,000 Units in JapanWings + You Never Walk Alone (Korean Studio Album + Repackage) Release Date: Oct 10, 2016 Repackage Release Date: Feb 13, 2017 2.006 Million Units in KoreaOver 73,000 Units in Japan442,000 Units in ChinaYouth (Japanese Studio Album) Release Date: Sep 7, 2016 200,000 Units in JapanThe Most Beautiful Moment in Life: Forever Young (Korean Complication Album) Release Date: May 2, 2016 630, 000 Units in Korea155,000 Units in ChinaThe Most Beautiful Moment in Life, Part 2 (EP) Release Date: Nov 30, 2015 580,000 Units in KoreaOver 14,000 in JapanThe Most Beautiful Moment in Life, Part 1 (EP) Release Date: Apr 29, 2015 486,000 Units in KoreaOver 12,000 Units in JapanWake Up (Japanese Studio Album) Release Date: Dec 24, 2014 Over 100,000 Units in JapanDark and Wild (Debut Korean Studio Album) Release Date Aug 19, 2014 314,000 Units in KoreaSkool Luv Affair (EP) Release date: Feb 12, 2014 335,000 Units in KoreaO!RUL8,2?
